Education.Major: BSA in Computer Science and Philosophy

Highlights: Performed investigative analysis through VisQL into issues such as company profit loss, systemic racism, and the spread of COVID-19
Researched data governance to ensure clients maintained HIPPA and FERPA compliance when hosting on Tableau server and embedding dashboards on websites using REST API
Tailored dashboard interfaces to optimize user experience
Integrated Python TabPy for predictive analysis
Leveraged custom SQL to optimize BI capabilities
Frontend development using ReactJS and React-Redux
Conducted UX research for adolescent age demographic
Built robotics applications in C++ and Python with ROS middleware
Developed natural language processing system in Python with fast Fourier Transform

Personal.Title: Capstone Workbook
Personal.Summary: Data visualization for social change. Data cleaned with Tableau Prep and visualized in Tableau Desktop. I got the idea after attending a BLM protest. I want to help people understand what they know.

Personal.Title: Flare
Personal.Summary: Disaster relief app aiding in personnel deployment. Software isolates people from drone images using ML and then displays risk markers in MapView API based on population density. Frontend created with Node.js and React Native.

Personal.Title: Longhorn Dining
Personal.Summary: Flask web-app deployed on Microsoft Azure. Provides accessibility to university students with dietary restrictions. Lead UI/UX developer. Published in The Daily Texan and later made native to the UT menus.
